Package ausroulette.model.bet

Interface SplitBet

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Bet
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SplitBetImpl
    public interface SplitBet
extends Bet
    Represents a split bet in the Aussie Roulette game in the Further Programming Assignment.

    You must not alter this interface.

    This interface extends from Bet.

    This interface should be implemented as SplitBetImpl which is used to represent both BetType.SPLIT_2 and BetType.SPLIT_4 bets.

    Note: When a split bet is created the implementation should arrange the numbers in using natural order (lower numbers before higher ones) so expected results can be returned from the split bet methods.

    Author:
    Ross Nye
    See Also:
    SplitBetImpl, Bet, BetType, Pocket

      • getNumber

        int getNumber​(SplitBet.SplitPos pos)
        Parameters:
        pos - the position in the split bet sequence to return
        Returns:

        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if SplitBet.SplitPos.THIRD or SplitBet.SplitPos.FORTH supplied for a BetType.SPLIT_2 bet
